title: Middle East Crisis: Hamas Leader Mourned in Qatar With Middle East on Edge
content: Ismail Haniyeh, the political leader of Hamas who was assassinated earlier this week, was being buried in Qatar. President Biden expressed deep concern about the situation in the region, and called on Israel to agree to a cease-fire in Gaza.
summary: Ismail Haniyeh, the political leader of Hamas who was assassinated earlier this week, was being buried in Qatar. President Biden expressed deep concern about the situation in the region, and called on Israel to agree to a cease-fire in Gaza.

title: Israel Confirms Death of Muhammad Deif, Who It Says Helped Planned Hamas Attack
content: The Israeli military said it had killed Muhammad Deif, who it called a planner of the Oct. 7 attack on Israel, which would make him the third Iranian-backed militant leader slain in recent days.
summary: The Israeli military said it had killed Muhammad Deif, who it called a planner of the Oct. 7 attack on Israel, which would make him the third Iranian-backed militant leader slain in recent days.

title: Israel, Defiant, Appears to Have Gone Rogue, Risking a Regional War

title: Nationwide Protests Over Hunger Rock Nigeria
